ygData.msgSnippet: Oh great.  So they take the most expensive skill and make it even more expensive.  I truely hope thats not the case, if so I hope they really work on improving
ygData.messageBody:
Oh great. So they take the most expensive skill and make it even more
expensive. I truely hope thats not the case, if so I hope they really
work on improving tinkering.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org

Uberkniggit - Level 14 Troll Shadowknight (mojo death ray touch)

> From: "Fausteen" <fausteen@...>

> Hello all,
>
> Long time reader, first time poster here. I spoke with a GM last night on
